articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Univ. Students
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Univ. Students
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a performance given by student art groups of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chol Ju University of Education, Pyongyang University of Medicine, Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Pyongyang University of Agriculture, Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce.
					 Put on the stage were poem-story telling and chorus "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee," kayagum ensemble "World Knows No Such Man as the Leader," female chorus "Memory of the Native Home," male chorus "A Thriving Nation Is in Sight," a witty talk "Our Morality," poem and chorus "Push Back the Frontiers of Science" and other colorful numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the great pride and happiness of studying as they wish with no more to desire in the world under the profound loving care of Kim Jong Il and fully demonstrated their firm faith and will to accomplish generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, always remaining true to the leadership of the Party.
					
					  He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance replete with the revolutionary soldier spirit the students staged with numbers of high cognitional and educational value truthfully reflecting their life by earnestly learning from the soldier culture created in the era of Songun. He highly appreciated the success made in the performance and extended thanks to them on behalf of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Noting that the revolutionary and militant students in the DPRK are the true young vanguard who steadfastly take the road of intense loyalty, single-mindedly remaining faithful to the WPK despite any difficulties and trials, he said with pride that the WPK is proud of having such trustworthy younger generation.
					
					 He highly estimated the successes made by the universities in the past, pointing out that the WPK is satisfied with the fact that the universities have made energetic endeavors to thoroughly implement the "Theses on Socialist Education" authored by President Kim Il Sung, training a lot of able native cadres and technical personnel who play key roles in the revolution and construction and making a positive contribution to the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for the education and upbringing at the universities, noting that it is a fundamental issue related to the destiny of the Korean revolution in the future to fully prepare the rising generation who will shoulder upon themselves the future of Korea as able talents and pillars of the country equipped with knowledge, good moral character and good health.
					
					 Among the audience were Secretary Choe Thae Bok and Department Director Kim Kyong Hui and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il of the Central Committee of the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yun Kwang Sop
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yun Kwang Sop
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Yun Kwang Sop, people's artiste of the Pyongyang Circus, on Monday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sultan of Brunei
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sultan of Brunei
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Sultan of Brunei Darussalam Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, head of the state, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the bilateral friendly relations would continue to favorably develop, the message wished the friendly people of Brunei greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Guyanan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Guyanan President
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Bharrat Jagdeo, President of Guyana, on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the proclamation of its Cooperative Republic.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the days ahead and sincerely wished the president success in his work for the development of the country and the promotion of his people's well-being.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Indonesian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, ambassador of Indonesia to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Polish Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Polish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Edward Pietrzyk, new Polish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.

articles.title: Meeting of Journalists and Media Persons Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Journalists and Media Persons Held
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of journalists and other media persons took place in Pyongyang on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Jung Rin and Kim Ki Nam and officials in the field of media, journalists, editors, anchorpersons, officials in the field of the ideological work of the Workers' Party of Korea and journalists and other media persons under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il's message to the participants of the meeting titled "Journalists and Other Media Persons Are Buglers Sounding Advance in Dynamic Drive for Building a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation" was conveyed by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his message clearly indicated tasks and ways for bringing about a fresh turn in the work in the field of media in the era of Songun as required by the revolution and the developing reality.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam delivered a report at the meeting.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il provided an immortal great programme to be upheld by the media in the DPRK long ago on the basis of President Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea of media and his exploits, adding he has wisely led the media of the WPK to creditably perform their role as a powerful ideological weapon.
					
					 The great leadership of Kim Jong Il on the media was more strikingly demonstrated in the days of enforcing the Songun politics in all fields, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 The journalists and other media persons have fully displayed the might of pens in a do-or-die struggle for foiling the reactionary ideological offensive of the imperialists through a revolutionary one and making a breakthrough in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The journalists and other media persons are faced with a duty to give fullest play to the mental power of the service personnel and people in order to bring earlier the emergence of a thriving nation, the reporter pointed out, calling on all of those media persons to become vanguard on the ideological front who will eternally glorify the idea and leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and consolidate the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 He also underscored the need for them to contribute to accomplishing as early as possible the cause of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans under the banner of the north-south joint declaration and firmly protecting the sound political and ideological traits and life style in the society of the DPRK from all sorts of challenges and counter-revolutionary offensives of the imperialists.
					
					 The report was followed by speeches made by Kim Ki Ryong, editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, Kim Pyong Ho, general director of the Korean Central News Agency, and other delegates.
					
					 They vowed to bring about great innovations and big leap forward with the might of pens, enshrining the historic message of Kim Jong Il to the participants of the meeting.
					
					 They declared that all the journalists and other media persons would creditably perform their honorable missions and tasks as vanguard on the ideological front and first-line buglers sounding an advance in the drive for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Vinalon Cotton Production Revitalized
articles.content:
Vinalon Cotton Production Revitalized
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The February 8 Vinalon Complex has resumed mass-producing quality vinalon cotton and various chemical goods after being streamlined.
					 Its workers completed a huge project of updating the production processes in a matter of two years.
					
					Vinalon was invented by Korean scientist Ri Sung Gi in Juche 28 (1939).
					
					 Before the liberation of Korea he had been harassed by the Japanese imperialists as he refused to make research concerning munitions production and even after the liberation he could not realize his wish for vinalon production owing to the obstructions of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets.
					
					 He, who came to the north of Korea during the Fatherland Liberation War, got through research into vinalon production on a commercial basis with limestone and anthracite abundant in Korea under the care of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 With preparations finished for vinalon production in an industrial way, the President chose the site of a vinalon factory and wisely guided the construction project.
					
					The "vinalon speed" was created in the construction of the factory.
					
					 The factory, which started operation on May 6, 1961 and turned into a complex later, has made its equipment large-sized and modern to increase the productivity and tangibly contribute to the country's economic development and people's living improvement.
					
					 Some time ago General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the complex to be very pleased with vinalon cotton being produced in quantities to fully supply quality vinalon cloth to the people as desired by the President. He said the resumed vinalon mass-production marked a signal event for the whole country and signified another great victory gained by the Korean people in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: LDP's Sycophancy toward US Ridiculed
articles.content:
LDP's Sycophancy toward US Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Liberal Democratic Party of Japan (LDP) recently came out with "a bill on special measures" and the issue of revising the Constitution. Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					 This is nothing but a ridiculous behavior of those obsessed with anachronistic sycophancy toward the U.S. and overseas expansion.
					
					 By nature the LDP is a group of factional elements made up of riff-raffs who became the target of derision and contempt at home and abroad for the lack of a proper political line, strategy and principle, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It was thanks to the U.S. backing that the LDP could reign over the Japanese politics for many years in the post-war period. The LDP has, in fact, faithfully served the U.S. but it was not properly rewarded for it. Its bid to enable Japan to sit on the UNSC ended in smoke due to the U.S.
					
					 It is great irony that the LDP does not feel ashamed of the insult and disgrace it has suffered before the U.S. It is quite natural for the LDP to find itself in such poor position as it dances to the tune of others without independence.
					
					 The LDP would be well advised to understand the mindset of the Japanese today and its deplorable position. It is imprudent for the LDP to peddle the "bill on special measures" and "revision of the Constitution" as it finds itself in a political quagmire, hit hard at home and abroad.
					
					 The LDP is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can return to power and realize its wild militarist ambition only when it curries the U.S. favor.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Row Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Treacherous Row Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative authorities are now loudmouthed about "lapse of six decades since the June 25 war." On this occasion they plan to stage varieties of big anti-DPRK events like banquets for the mercenaries who participated in the Korean war and build a "park in memory of the landing operation in Inchon" and erect a "monument" through the allocation of huge funds.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 This is a shameless distortion and mockery of history and truth and an unpardonable challenge to the compatriots who have made every sincere effort for reconciliation and unity, the peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The conservative group should seriously reflect on the acts of treachery committed by them and make an apology for them to all the Koreans this year marking the lapse of six decades since south Korea ignited a war against the north in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities have perpetrated reckless provocations against the north, far from responding to its efforts to achieve reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south and improve the inter-Korean relations, lashing all Koreans into great fury.
					
					 Only shameful destruction awaits the group of traitors rushing headlong into confrontation and war, their backs turned on the nation.
					
					 They would be well advised to give up their foolish attempt if they do not want to commit more hideous crimes against history and the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Action under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Action under Fire
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea called a news conference in Seoul on Feb. 17 blasting the puppet authorities for taking a humiliating action as regards the disposal of scrapped ammunition of the U.S. forces.
					 The above-said organization recalled it was disclosed by media recently that more than half of the scrapped ammunition taken over from the U.S. forces present in south Korea according to the 2008 agreement is condemned one.
					
					 Accusing the "Defence Ministry" of excusing itself that it took over only useful ammunition, the organization noted that the assertion of the military authorities is a sheer lie as it totally lacks plausibility in the light of the fact that the term of storage of most of the above-said ammunition expired long ago.
					
					 The organization made it clear that the U.S. deputy secretary of State had already sent a message to the "minister of Defence" of south Korea admitting the problem concerning the scrapped ammunition.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the military authorities agreed to accept the above-said ammunition, the organization noted, deploring that this action resulted in bringing a great benefit to the U.S. while causing an enormous loss to south Korea. 
					
					 It demanded that those responsible for making such a humiliating agreement be punished and renegotiations be conducted to set right the wrong agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Projected Maneuvers Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Projected Maneuvers Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea and other civic and social organizations called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 19 in denunciation of the trigger-happy elements' projected war exercises aimed to invade the north.
					 The speakers at the press conference accused the U.S. and south Korean war-like forces of planning to stage the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises throughout south Korea from March 8 to 18 involving huge armed forces. They branded this as an undisguised threat to the north.
					
					 The aggressive nature of this saber-rattling is becoming clearer as it is pursuant to "OPLAN 5027", the scenario to mount a preemptive attack on the north, in particular, they noted, adding:
					
					 Through this action the U.S. and the present authorities of south Korea disclosed themselves that they have, in actuality, no will to opt for building a peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula, though they are paying lip-service to "peace".
					
					 They demanded a prompt cancellation of the plan to stage large-scale joint military exercises which will only strain the situation on the peninsula.

articles.title: GNP's Move to Suppress Democracy Rapped
articles.content:
GNP's Move to Suppress Democracy Rapped
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- More than 100 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Joint Conference of Human Rights Organizations jointly called a press conference in Seoul on February 17 to denounce the action of the "Grand National Party" (GNP) to suppress the freedom of assembly and demonstration.
					The organizations accused the GNP of working hard to railroad an "amendment to the law on assembly and demonstration" through "extraordinary session of the National Assembly".
					
					They charged that this "amendment" is aimed at making the existing "law on assembly and demonstration" more retrogressive as it, in fact, calls for totally banning night assembly. 
					
					Noting that freedom of assembly and demonstration is the elementary right of the people, they declared it is a dictatorial and undemocratic action to totally abridge the right.

articles.title: Reckless Actions of NIS Flayed
articles.content:
Reckless Actions of NIS Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea sent a written opinion to the UN Human Rights Council on Feb. 15 in protest against the reckless actions of the puppet National Intelligence Service (NIS).
					 The organization in its written opinion recalled that since the emergence of the present regime the NIS has become evermore undisguised in its illegal acts.
					
					 The investigation into the enterprises supporting civic and public organizations, the inspection of those forces opposed to the "construction of a big canal" and the operation to woo figures from all walk of life to vote for "the amendment to the motion on the construction of Sejong City," etc. are just part of its wrong doings, it charged.
					
					 The organization urged the UN Human Rights Council to positively cooperate in the efforts to take measures for a halt to the NIS's abuse of power.

articles.title: DR Congo Figure Lauds Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
DR Congo Figure Lauds Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of the Democratic Republic of Congo, issued a statement on Feb. 10 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 He said in his statement that Kim Jong Il mastered the idea and theory of President Kim Il Sung and developed and enriched the Juche idea, Songun idea fathered by him.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Kim Jong Il who has the great love for the people is devoting his whole life to them.
					
					 The flesh-and-blood relations forged between the leader and the masses represent the greatest of the feats performed by him.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are registering brilliant successes in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation, rallied close around him.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun policy enforced by him, the persistent moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK prove futile.
					
					 The people of the DPRK will fling open the gate to a thriving nation in the near future relying on the solid self-supporting national economy and the cutting-edge science and technology.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Austria
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, issued a special bulletin on Feb. 11 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					The bulletin carried a portrait of  Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin in an article said:
					
					He was born as the son of President Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, and
						 Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu on Feb. 16, 1942 and grew up in the crucible of the great anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He deeply studied the Juche idea founded by the President and authored a lot of works, developing and enriching the Juche idea in practice.
					
					 He firmly protected the sovereignty of the country under the uplifted banner of Songun in the 90s of the last century when the situation was the grimmest.
					
					 The DPRK is now standing as an invulnerable bulwark in the struggle for socialism and sovereignty as it is advancing under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Iran, Democratic Congo, Mali and Indonesia and a lecture and a book and photo exhibition took place in Guinea between Feb. 10 and 13 in the run-up to the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					On display in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal revolutionary exploits and books and photos on Songun Korea.
					
					Present there were personages of various strata and other people in those countries.
					
					The chairman of the International Relations Committee of the Iran Parties House spoke highly of the characteristics of the outstanding leadership art of Kim Jong Il--the organic combination of politics and military affairs, creative politics of solving every issue his own way, not subject to the existing formulas and practice, brilliant flexible and preeminent politics and rare ability of practice that he puts everything into practice once he is determined.
					
					The vice-chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo said that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people have advanced, holding aloft the banner of socialism, undeterred by any anti-DPRK move of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, adding they set a far-reaching goal to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2010 and are working world-startling miracles day by day.
					
					The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said that Kim Jong Il is not only the supreme leader of the Korean people but the dearest man whom they can tell their inmost feelings and the kind-hearted father of all families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Peru on Feb. 13.
					 The work, published on Mar. 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and absurdity of the sophistry that socialism is "totalitarian," "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding" let loose by the imperialists and renegades of socialism.
					
					 It also clarifies the principled issues arising in defending the cause of socialism and accomplishing it such as the issues of regarding socialism as faith and putting it on a moral basis and giving full play to its advantages.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- In May Juche 61 (1972) President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to the Oryu Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					 He looked at fields abundant with spring cabbage and radish as well as spinach with satisfaction and then turned his eyes to the opposite field on the ridge.
					
					 Some peasants were tilling the field with the help of draught oxen.
					
					 He felt sorry to find an old trace of farm work from them.
					
					 He summoned an official of the farm to ask how many hectares a draught ox ploughed a day, how many draught oxen, tractors and lorries it had and how much cultivated acreage it owned.
					
					 Having calculated with the official the number of tractors needed to replace the oxen, the President estimated even the amount of fuel proper to the farm's area under tillage, vehicles and volume of traffic.
					
					 Back from the field guidance he sent many tractors and various kinds of farming machines to the farm.
					
					 That year the farm reaped the richest vegetable harvest ever known in the area.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Conjunto Artistico del MINSEP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Conjunto Artistico del MINSEP
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de estreno del nuevamente organizado Conjunto Artistico del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo.
					 Los artistas de esa entidad presentaron en la escena el coro "Que reciba saludo", el duo mixto y coro "Febrero es primavera", el cuarteto femenino y coro "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo", la cancion acompanada de Oungum "Al Lucero General, mas alla de las nubes" y otros programas de diferentes generos.
					
					 A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico del gran honor y orgullo de los integrantes del MINSEP que crecidos en el regazo de amor del gran General Insigne del Paektu, viven y luchan como soldados revolucionarios del partido y el lider y defensores del pueblo.
					
					Igualmente, pusieron de pleno manifiesto el poderio de ese ejercito del interior que vino defendiendo fidedignamente las conquistas de la patria socialista y la seguridad del pueblo en la linea avanzada de lucha clasista manteniendo su tradicion de mas de 60 anos de defender al lider a costa de la vida.
					
					 Asimismo, mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los oficiales del MINSEP de defender inexpugnablemente el mas ventajoso regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares al compartir siempre con el Dirigente la idea, el proposito, el aliento y el destino y cumplir con su honrosa mision de unidad en la primera linea de lucha clasista y de ejercito del interior del partido.
					
					 El Dirigente felicito los exitos alcanzados en la ocasion respondiendo cordialmente a la aclamacion entusiasta de los ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					 Muy satisfecho de que los artistas hayan ofrecido esta popular y magnifica funcion, en que palpita el espiritu de la epoca, con las canciones favoritas del pueblo coreano, evaluo altamente sus exitos de la ocasion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					  Expresando la esperaza y conviccion de que el nuevo Conjunto Artistico del MINSEP cumplira satisfactoriamente con su honrosa mision y deber de trompetero de la era del Songun al llamar dinamicamente a las masas populares a la revolucion y la construccion mediante sus revolucionarias y combativas actividades artisticas, indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la propaganda artistica.
					
					  Le acompanaron los secretarios Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kang Nung Su, y otros cuadros del CC del PTC, el miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo Ju Sang Song, el jefe de la Direccion Politica del MINSEP, Ri Pyong Sam, y otros miembros de mando de esta cartera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la politica de obediencia de Japon a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la politica de obediencia de Japon a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ATCC) -- El "proyecto de ley por la medida especial" y el problema de enmienda constitucional con que salio en ultimos dias el Partido Democratico Liberal (PDL) de Japon devienen los ridiculos comportamientos de quienes estan enloquecidos por la anacronica sumision a EE.UU. y la expansion ultramarina.
					 Asi senalo el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 22 y continua:
					
					 Desde el principio, el PDL es un club de las fracciones que ha sido objeto de la censura interna y externa porque no tenia una clara linea politica ni una estrategia ni un principio.
					
					 Esa entidad politica habia tomado la rienda de la politica de Japon durante largo tiempo despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Esto se debia enteramente a la ayuda de EE.UU.
					
					  De hecho, ella habia desempenado fielmente el papel del lacayo de ese pais norteamericano sin recibir el merecido pago. El sueno del PDL de hacer de Japon el pais permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU se hizo pedazos por su amo norteamericano.
					
					  Lo ridiculo es que el PDL no se siente el sentimiento de insulta ni la verguenza que le da EE.UU.
					
					  Eso es merecido porque el actua sin la independencia bailando al son que le toca otro.
					
					  El PDL debe darse clara cuenta de la actual opinion publica de Japon y su situacion.
					
					  Puesto que el PDL se encuentra en la situacion politicamente dificil al ser aislado en el interior y exterior del pais, el "proyecto de ley por la medida especial" y la "enmienda constitucional" con que salen ellos resultan los actos  insolentes.
					
					  Esa entidad piensa que es preciso adular a EE.UU. para volver a tomar el Poder y realizar su ambicion militarista. Pero, eso no pasa de ser un sueno.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica nueva maniobra anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica nueva maniobra anti-RPDC en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" aprobaron la "ley de derechos humanos del Norte" en el "Comite para Relaciones Exteriores, Comercio y Reunificacion" de la "Asamblea Nacional" titere del Sur de Corea a pesar de que hicieron mutis los "parlamentarios" de partidos opositores.
					 Al respecto, el rotativo Minju Joson publico en su edicion del dia 21 un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					La banda de conservadores surcoreanos, que vino actuando desesperadamente para hacer dano a los compatriotas, invento esta vez la ley referida con el fin de endurecer su campana intrigante anti-RPDC en la esfera de "DDHH".
					
					Esto significa abierta declaracion de confrontacion y guerra contra el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC no ha censurado hasta ahora la critica situacion de DDHH del Sur de Corea porque quiso anticipar la reunificacion independiente al mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y promover la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion.
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos, peores violadores de DDHH del mundo, ni siquiera tienen derecho ni justificacion de cuestionar a alguien en el mismo tema.
					
					Aunque no pueden limpiarse ni su propia nariz, ellos cuestionan obstinadamente la situacion de "DDHH" de la RPDC partiendo de su siniestra intencion de mantener su sucia vida al salir de la grave crisis politica, en que estan hundidos en el ambito interno y externo, y de calumniar y perjudicar a los connacionales en contubernio con su amo gringo.
					
					Les seria conveniente a ellos que desistan de esa campana anti-RPDC dandose cuenta de que esta es un acto suicida.
					
					Se vuelve a advertir que los maniacos de confrontacion, que se atreven a mellar y ofender el sagrado regimen de la RPDC, la preciosa dignidad y los derechos humanos del pueblo coreano, nunca podran salir ilesos y lo pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena actos programados en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena actos programados en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ATCC) -- Ahora, las autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea hablan con bombo y platillo del "60o aniversario de la guerra del 25 de junio" y con este motivo tratan de celebrar grandes actividades anti-RPDC como "banquete de consuelo" para los mercenarios que habian participado en esa guerra coreana.
					 Igualmente, planean construir el "parque memorial de la operacion de desembarco en Inchon" y un "monumento" asignando fabulosos fondos.
					
					 Esto deviene descarada tergiversacion e insulto a la historia y la verdad e imperdonable desafio a los connacionales que se esfuerzan sinceramente por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y por la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 22 y continua:
					
					 Este ano cuando se cumplen 60 anos desde que el Sur de Corea provoco la guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, la banda de conservadores surcoreanos debe reflexionar seriamente de sus crimenes antinacionales y pedir de rodillas las disculpas a todos los coreanos.
					
					  Todos los coreanos estan sumamente indignados por las maniobras antinacionales de esa banda que actua sin prudencia provocando atrevidamente a la RPDC, lejos de sumarse a los esfuerzos de esta por la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					  La banda de traidores, que avanza sin vacilacion alguna en el camino de enfrentamiento y guerra dando espaldas a la nacion, sera arruinada al fin y al cabo de modo ignominioso.
					
					  Las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas deben renunciar a sus necios intentos si no quieren cometer crimenes mas graves en contra de la historia y la nacion.
